title: Yearly Hepatitis C cases - Over 75 years old (2013-2016)
name: Ov75Hcv
description: Mean yearly Hepatitis C cases in people over 75 years of age from 2013-2016
comments: Data included for Hepatitis C State and County Mortality is for 2014-2017, while Hepatitis C State Prevalence data are available for 2013-2016
